name: Reincarnation of the Ninja
description:
You are a ninja who will reincarnate after his death. Sometimes you have to die to progress.  Another game mechanics is using your shurikens to make a ladders on a walls. Gain a ninja parkour skills unless you are without a chance.

A hardcore rage inducing platformer (but no worries - checkpoints are included;).

The goal is to get to the exit in a best time and if you feel skilled enough you can pick all 8 coins.

Controls
- WASD / arrows ... movement
- SPACE ... fire a shuriken
- R ... completely restart the game

(pro tip - when you are just in front of the wall, press up and space together)

Bugs: There is a rare bug where you cannot reincarnate (after death the game don't restart from the last checkpoint). You will probably never run into this error, but if you do, just restart the game with 'R' key. I had no time to fix it, sorry :-/
